level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter, including rules for the valuation of the factors to be considered under ยง 50-551.06.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 1009 of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under ยง 10-551.01

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Rulemaking Authority to the Department of General Services, see Mayor's Order 2011-168, October 5, 2011 (58 DCR 8842).
